title: Vintage Camera
description: A beautifully preserved 1970s film camera with manual focus and exposure controls. This classic piece features a fully functional light meter, original leather casing, and comes with a vintage camera strap. Perfect for photography enthusiasts looking to explore analog photography.

title: Acoustic Guitar
description: Premium six-string acoustic guitar crafted from solid spruce top with mahogany back and sides. Recently re-strung with high-quality phosphor bronze strings, this instrument produces rich, warm tones perfect for both beginners and experienced musicians. Includes a padded gig bag.

title: Luxury Wrist Watch
description: Elegant automatic wrist watch featuring a sophisticated stainless steel bracelet, sapphire crystal glass, and water resistance up to 100 meters. This timepiece includes a date complication and luminous hands, powered by a precise mechanical movement that never needs batteries.

title: Leather Boots
description: Handcrafted brown leather boots made from full-grain leather that will develop a beautiful patina over time. Features Goodyear welt construction for durability, comfortable cushioned insoles, and rugged rubber outsoles for excellent traction. Men's size 42 (US 9).

title: Mountain Landscape Painting
description: Stunning oil on canvas painting depicting a serene mountain landscape at sunrise. This original artwork measures 24x36 inches and is framed in a beautiful wooden frame. The artist has masterfully captured the play of light on the mountain peaks and the misty valleys below.

title: Noise Cancelling Headphones
description: Premium over-ear headphones with advanced active noise cancellation technology. Features high-resolution audio drivers, 30-hour battery life, plush memory foam ear cushions, and built-in microphone for crystal-clear calls. Includes carrying case and charging cable.

title: Vintage Radio
description: Beautifully restored 1950s tube radio with AM/FM reception and original wood cabinet. This retro piece has been professionally serviced with new capacitors and tubes while maintaining its classic aesthetic. Perfect as a decorative piece or for actual use.

title: Antique Pocket Watch
description: Exquisite gold-plated antique pocket watch from the early 1900s. Features a detailed engraved case, Roman numeral dial, and a reliable mechanical movement that still keeps accurate time. Comes with a vintage chain and is a perfect collector's item or unique gift.

title: Vintage Typewriter
description: Fully functional 1950s manual typewriter in excellent working condition. This mechanical marvel features all original parts, a carrying case, and types clean, crisp letters. A wonderful piece of history that's both decorative and functional for creative writing.

title: Ceramic Vase
description: Hand-thrown ceramic vase with stunning blue glaze that transitions from deep cobalt to pale sky blue. This unique piece stands 14 inches tall and features an organic, asymmetrical form that makes it a striking centerpiece for any room. Signed by the artist on the bottom.

title: Classic Book Collection
description: Beautiful hardcover collection of five literary classics including 'Moby Dick', 'Pride and Prejudice', 'Great Expectations', 'Wuthering Heights', and 'Jane Eyre'. These collector's editions feature gold-embossed covers, ribbon markers, and high-quality paper that will last generations.

title: Designer Sunglasses
description: Luxury polarized sunglasses featuring 100% UV protection, scratch-resistant lenses, and lightweight metal frames. These stylish shades reduce glare and enhance contrast while providing superior eye protection. Comes with original hard case and microfiber cleaning cloth.

title: Travel Backpack
description: Durable 30-liter waterproof backpack designed for travelers and commuters. Features multiple compartments including a padded laptop sleeve, organizational pockets, water bottle holders, and comfortable padded shoulder straps. Made from ripstop nylon with reinforced stitching.

title: LED Desk Lamp
description: Modern LED desk lamp with adjustable brightness and color temperature settings. Features touch controls, USB charging port, flexible gooseneck design, and energy-efficient LED bulbs that provide natural-looking light perfect for reading, working, or studying.

title: Camera Lens
description: Professional 50mm f/1.8 prime lens for DSLR cameras. This fast lens produces beautiful background blur (bokeh) and excels in low-light conditions. Includes front and rear lens caps, lens hood, and carrying case. Compatible with most major DSLR brands.
